name: Linescore
description:
Unified line score throughout the app:

iPhone Team Page - Live, Final
iPad Team Page - Live, Final
iPhone Scoreboard - Live, Final
iPad Gameday - Live
iPhone Gameday Box - Live, Final
iPad MLB.TV right overlay - Live (or archive feed)
iPhone MLB.TV overlay - Live (or archive feed)
iPad Wrap - Final
iPhone Wrap - Final
